equipment.name: Loop
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> deals <text class='c_random'>35.08%</text> increased damage to its primary target per lanced enemy.
added_affixes: Restore <text class='c_random'>4.5</text> of your Primary Resource when you Crowd Control an enemy.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Pants
strikethrough_affixes: Consuming a <text class='c_important'>Corpse</text> has a <text class='c_random'>39.76%</text> chance to spawn a <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orb</u></text>.
added_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>1.83</text> Armor, but your <text class='c_important'>Evade</text> has <text class='c_number'>150%</text> increased Cooldown.

equipment.name: Serpent Stone
base_affixes: Whenever your <text class='c_important'>Blood</text> Skills <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text> you gain <text class='c_random'>31.28%</text> Attack Speed for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds.
8.14% Damage Reduction from Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies

equipment.name: Spinal Wand
base_affixes: +18% Critical Strike Damage with Bone Skills
strikethrough_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>28.66%</text> increased Critical Strike Chance for <text class='c_number'>9</text> seconds when you cast <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>. You deal <text class='c_random'>57.33%</text> bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>.
added_affixes: Your <text class='c_important'>Sacrifice</text> bonuses are increased by <text class='c_random'>37.14%</text>.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Gloves
base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Surge’s</text> nova echoes again after a short delay, dealing <text class='c_random'>78.14%</text> less damage.

equipment.name: Warlord Greathelm
base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills grant <text class='c_number'>30%</text> Damage Reduction for <text class='c_random'>6.12</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Sovereign Mail
strikethrough_affixes: When there are at least <text class='c_number'>7.5</text> Close enemies, Stun them for <text class='c_random'>4.98</text> seconds. This can only occur once every <text class='c_number'>30</text> seconds.
added_affixes: Each time that <text class='c_important'>Bone Storm</text> damages an enemy, gain a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> equal to <text class='c_random'>7.22%</text> of your Base Life for <text class='c_number'>15</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Choker
base_affixes: +(0.8+0.6*2) Rank of the Fueled by Death Passive
strikethrough_affixes: You have <text class='c_number'>30%</text> increased Crowd Control Duration. While enemies are <text class='c_important'><u>Unstoppable</u></text>, you deal <text class='c_random'>40.04%</text> increased damage to them.
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills gain <text class='c_random'>40.13%</text> Attack Speed.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Boots
strikethrough_affixes: Every <text class='c_number'>12</text> seconds, your Skeletal Mages cast a blizzard that deals <text class='c_random'>1.06</text> Cold damage and continuously <text class='c_important'><u>Chills</u></text> enemies for <text class='c_number'>12%</text> over <text class='c_number'>9</text> seconds.
added_affixes: While <text class='c_important'><u>Unstoppable</u></text> and for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds after, you gain <text class='c_random'>15.49%</text> increased Movement Speed and can move freely through enemies.

equipment.name: Ring
base_affixes: While <text class='c_important'><u>Healthy</u></text>, <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text> grant <text class='c_random'>25.5</text> Essence.
+9% Damage to Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies
